name: read tcf
desc: The Read_TCF module is one of a limited set of Time_Data modules. These modules are specifically designed to create models and animations of data that changes over time.

properties.name: Log Process Nodal Data
properties.desc: The Log Process Nodal Data value when selected will take the log value of the input nodal data.

properties.name: Log Process Cell Data
properties.desc: The Log Process Cell Data value when selected will take the log value of the input cell data.

properties.name: Date And Time
properties.desc: The Date and Time of interest.

properties.name: Time Loop
properties.desc: The Time Loop controls setting the Date and Time by specified increments.

properties.name: Start Date
properties.desc: The Start Date is the beginning time of the simulation.  This value is set to the first date in the file.

properties.name: End Date
properties.desc: The End Date is the end time for the simulation.  This value is set to the last date in the file.

properties.name: Step Time Units
properties.desc: The Step Time Units specify the increment for advancement when stepping or running.

properties.name: Step Size
properties.desc: The Step Size value specifies a factor, along with the Step Time Units, for the increment for advancement when stepping or running.

properties.name: Convert To Packaged
properties.desc: Replace this module with a packaged version of the data.
